import React, { Component } from "react"; let styles = { backgroundImage: "url(images/img_bg.jpg)", opacity: "0.8", }; export default class Introduction extends Component { render() { return (

  • Hi!
    I'm Viet

    View CV

  • I love building
    THINGS !!

    View Projects

  • I often
    Write ...{" "}

    View Blog

); } }
